text: (ao mnoussa lok.) chaur puok anak braneangobracheng knea tow rk kar aphytosa pi mcheasa robsa puok anak ning tow rk thansuokr del ttung robsa vea brieb dauchchea ttung mekh ning phendei delke ban riebcham vea samreab banda anak del mean chomnue leu a l laoh ning anakneasar teang lay robsa trong . teangnih ku chea kar braosa bratan robsa a l laoh del trongbratan vea champoh anaknea del trong mean chetnea . haey a l laoh meankar braosa bratan da thomtheng
